1003950.name: Right to Rule
1003950.description:
Right to Rule is a co-op Action RPG currently being developed by three friends as a passion project, where you and your companions venture through the Kingdom of Drakenheim, completing quests and making impactful decisions that alter the fate of the island. Uncover sinister plots, fulfill destinies, and make your mark upon the land.

  • Craft weapons, armour, potions, and more!

  • Branching conversation and storylines which impact the overall story and world

  • Choose from a range of playstyles, focusing on melee, ranged, magic, charisma, and more

  • Complete quests in multiple ways, including hidden paths and dialogues to resolve conflict

  • Fight world bosses for loot to gain an edge

  • Complete puzzles, riddles, and skill checks to unlock hidden paths and treasures

  • Create your own custom character with our character creator

  • Intricate crime and punishment system where guards will persue and subdue you to the degree of the law

  • Explore the living, breathing world of Drakenheim, where every character has a unique story to tell and a place in the world

Right to Rule can be enjoyed with up to 4 players, or completely solo.
